```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
PDAC_exp_data = read_rds(here('results/validation_results/PDAC_validation/PDAC_RNAseq_data_for_model.rds'))

LINCS_klaeger_data_wide = read_csv(here('results/all_klaeger_LINCS_data_for_ml_wide.csv'))

testing_results = bind_rows(
	read_rds(here('results/validation_results/PDAC_validation/validation_screen_part2.rds')),
	read_rds(here('results/validation_results/PDAC_validation/validation_screen_part3.rds'))
) %>% filter(! qc_fail) 

PDAC_inital_screen_data = read_rds(here('data/PDAC_data/screen_combined.rds')) 

klaegerscan_PDAC_matches = read_csv(here('results/matching/PDAC_LINCS_klaeger_drug_matches.csv'))

model_vars = read_rds(here('results/PRISM_LINCS_klaeger_models_auc/PRISM_LINCS_klaeger_data_for_ml_5000feat_auc.rds.gz')) %>% 
	slice(1)

final_xgboost_model = read_rds(here('results/PRISM_LINCS_klaeger_models_auc/activation_expression/regression/xgboost/final_xgboost_model.rds.gz'))
```

```{r}
#summarising PDAC validation data 

validation_summaries = testing_results %>% 
	group_by(compound, concentration_M, cell_line) %>%
	summarise(sd = sd(viability),
						num_samples = n(),
						viability = mean(viability),
						CV = sd/viability) %>%
	mutate(cell_line = case_when(
		cell_line == "P1004" ~ "P0422_T1",
		cell_line == "P1304" ~ "P0411_T1",
		cell_line == "CAF" ~ "P0119_T1"
	)) %>% 
	select(compound, concentration_M, cell_line, viability) %>% 
	rename(drug = compound,
				 viability = viability) %>% 
	ungroup()

#summarising PDAC screen data 

PDAC_inital_screen_data_summarised = bind_rows(
	PDAC_inital_screen_data %>%
		filter(compound %in% klaegerscan_PDAC_matches$PDAC_compound_name, dose_anchor_m == 0, dose_compound_m != 0),
	PDAC_inital_screen_data %>%
		filter(anchor %in% klaegerscan_PDAC_matches$PDAC_compound_name, dose_compound_m == 0, dose_anchor_m != 0)
) %>% 
	mutate(drug = case_when(
	dose_anchor_m == 0 ~ compound,
	dose_compound_m == 0 ~ anchor
)) %>%
	mutate(dose = case_when(
	dose_anchor_m == 0 ~ dose_compound_m,
	dose_compound_m == 0 ~ dose_anchor_m
)) %>% 
	select(drug, dose, cell_line, viability) %>%
	rename(concentration_M = dose) %>% 
	mutate(cell_line = case_when(
		cell_line == "P1004" ~ "P0422_T1",
		cell_line == "P1304" ~ "P0411_T1",
		cell_line == "CAF" ~ "P0119_T1"
	)) %>% 
	rename(PDAC_compound_name = drug) %>% 
	left_join(klaegerscan_PDAC_matches) %>% 
	select(-PDAC_compound_name, -cid) %>% 
	group_by(drug, concentration_M, cell_line) %>% 
	summarise(viability = mean(viability)) %>% 
	ungroup()

all_PDAC_viability_data = PDAC_inital_screen_data_summarised %>% 
	bind_rows(validation_summaries)
	
cell_line_drug_combos = all_PDAC_viability_data %>%
	ungroup() %>% 
	select(drug, cell_line) %>% 
	unique() %>% 
	filter(!drug == "DMSO")
```

```{r}
#convert viability data to AUC

all_PDAC_validation_results = data.frame()
for(i in 1:dim(cell_line_drug_combos)[1]) {
query_drug = cell_line_drug_combos$drug[i]
query_cell_line = cell_line_drug_combos$cell_line[i]

this_data = all_PDAC_viability_data %>% 
	filter(drug == query_drug & cell_line == query_cell_line) %>% 
	#convert dose to uM
	mutate(concentration_M = concentration_M*10^6)

auc = 100 - computeAUC(concentration = this_data$concentration_M,
								 viability = this_data$viability,
								 viability_as_pct = TRUE,
								 conc_as_log = FALSE,
								 area.type = "Fitted")
								 # Hill_fit = c(hill_slope, E_inf, ec50))

ic50 = computeIC50(concentration = this_data$concentration_M,
								 viability = this_data$viability,
								 viability_as_pct = TRUE,
								 conc_as_log = FALSE)
								 # Hill_fit = c(hill_slope, E_inf, ec50)) 


results_dataframe = data.frame(drug = query_drug, cell_line = query_cell_line, exp_auc = auc, exp_ic50 = ic50)

all_PDAC_validation_results = bind_rows(all_PDAC_validation_results, results_dataframe)
}
```


```{r}
#make predictions for in-house tested cell line compound combinations

PDAC_dataset_for_model = cell_line_drug_combos %>% 
	left_join(LINCS_klaeger_data_wide) %>%
	select(drug, cell_line, any_of(names(model_vars))) %>% 
	left_join(PDAC_exp_data)

model_predictions = augment(final_xgboost_model,
														PDAC_dataset_for_model 
															%>% mutate(broad_id = NA,
																				 depmap_id = NA,
																				 ccle_name = NA,
																				 exp_AL162231.1 = 0,
																				 exp_AC093512.2 = 0,
																				 exp_AC008397.1 = 0,
																				 exp_AC007906.2 = 0, 
																				 exp_AL445238.1 = 0,
																				 exp_AL445989.1 = 0
																				 )) %>% 
	select(-starts_with("act_"), -starts_with("exp_"))

model_predictions_tidy = model_predictions %>%
	mutate(pred_auc = signif(.pred,3)) %>% 
	select(-.pred, -broad_id, -depmap_id, -ccle_name)
```

```{r}
#assessment of validation

validation_assessment = all_PDAC_validation_results %>% 
	mutate(drug = ifelse(drug == "ONO-4059 (analog)","ONO-4059 analogue",drug)) %>% 
	left_join(model_predictions_tidy) %>% 
	rename(predicted_auc = pred_auc) %>% 
	mutate(exp_auc = exp_auc/100) %>% 
	filter(!is.na(predicted_auc))

rsq = cor(validation_assessment$exp_auc, validation_assessment$predicted_auc)

rmse = rmse(validation_assessment$exp_auc, validation_assessment$predicted_auc)
```

```{r}
validation_assessment %>% 
	ggplot(aes(x = predicted_auc, y = exp_auc)) +
	geom_point() +
	geom_smooth(method = "lm", color = wes_palettes$GrandBudapest1[2]) +
	geom_abline(intercept = 0, slope = 1, size = 0.5, colour = 'black', linetype = 3) +
	labs(title = 
  paste0('R = ',
			 				 round(
			 				 	rsq,
			 				 	1),
			 				 '/ RMSE = ',
			 				 round(
			 				 	rmse,
			 				 	2)
			 	), 
  x = "Predicted AUC",
  y = "Actual AUC") +
	theme(
		panel.background = element_rect(fill = "transparent",colour = NA),
		panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), 
		panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
		plot.background = element_rect(fill = "transparent",colour = NA)
	)
ggsave(here('figures/PRISM_LINCS_klaeger/validation/preliminary_DK_validation_assessment.png'), height = 10, width = 9.5, units = "cm")
```
